original: Ekströmer, Carl Ivar, bruksägare, Klavreström, f. 5/6/80 å Fågelfors, Kalm. 1., av bruksäg., kapt. Melcher E. o. Agnes Carlson. G. 06 m. Eva von Krusenstjerna, d. 37; 2. 38 m. Ingegerd af Petersens. Barn: Lars f. 08, Johan 10, Ulla 13, Fredrik 16, Agnes 19. — Jur. utr. kand. i Upps. 04. Verkst. dir. o. istyr :led. i A-B Klaf-reströms Bruk sed. 11, A-B Fogelfors Bruk sed. 18. Äg. av Hornsborg sed. 41. Led. av riksd. första kamm. sed. 36, led. av för&ta lagutsk. KV02kl, ProPGM, Hush ist. o. lilla GM.
translated: Ekströmer, Carl Ivar, industrialist, Klavreström, born June 5th, 1880 in Fågelfors, Kalm. County, son of industrialist Captain Melcher E. and Agnes Carlson. Married in 1906 to Eva von Krusenstjerna who passed away in 1937. Remarried in 1938 to Ingegerd af Petersens. Children: Lars born in 1908, Johan in 1910, Ulla in 1913, Fredrik in 1916, Agnes in 1919. Graduated with a law degree from Uppsala in 1904. CEO and board member of AB Klavreströms Bruk since 1911 and AB Fogelfors Bruk since 1918. Owner of Hornsborg since 1941. Member of the first chamber of Parliament since 1936, member of the first law committee KV02kl, ProPGM, Hush ist. and the small GM.
